LABEL: 0x25E
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0x2A1
STRING: %ZI'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0x2FD
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average.

LABEL: 0x346
STRING: I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0x393
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0x402
STRING: We're still second years though. I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0x477
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, fearing a black mark on their report, so no one dares to stand out.

LABEL: 0x500
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0x57F
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future. Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0x5E6
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0x681
STRING: Today is the start of a new semester.

LABEL: 0x6BE
STRING: I arrived at school with plenty of time to spare, entered the classroom, took my seat, and began reading the rest of my light novel.

LABEL: 0x73F
STRING: I bought this the day before yesterday, and it's quite interesting.

LABEL: 0x7A8
STRING: The story is a typical amnesia story.

LABEL: 0x7F1
STRING: A boy who has lost his memory is offered a drink "au lait" by an unfamiliar girl.

LABEL: 0x868
STRING: As the story progresses, more and more is revealed about the girl and the boy's past.

LABEL: 0x8E3
STRING: At the moment her darkness is revealed, the girl always puts on a crazy face, and the boy meets an unfortunate fate.

LABEL: 0x97A
STRING: It's a quite an eccentric tale, but it's quite interesting too.

LABEL: 0x9D7
STRING: Among them, my favourite is a "bokkuko" girl called Rikana Millefiori.

LABEL: 0xA48
STRING: She's a tsundere moe-moe younger-sister type of character with blonde twintails.

LABEL: 0xAF8
STRING: Rikana-tan, I hope they make merchandise of you soon... Ah, I can't wait for it.

LABEL: 0xC10
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xC1E
STRING: "O〜i. Can you hear me? You're not just ignoring me, are you?"

LABEL: 0xD1A
STRING: While absentmindedly thinking about 2-D girls, I was suddenly bonked on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0xD8C
STRING: Aah, I was just about to get to the good part... What the heck.

LABEL: 0xDC9
STRING: Don't spoil my fun.

LABEL: 0xEA4
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xEB2
STRING: "Ah, you're reading something weird again, you're really into that kind of stuff, aren't you?"

LABEL: 0x106E
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x107C
STRING: "Yo. You're early, Metarou! Is this your morning "super-otaku-time" routine?"

LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: I turned around and there they were, my childhood friends Nana and Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x126F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x127D
STRING: "Metarou, you're not popular because you only read that weird stuff."

LABEL: 0x1377
STRING: Nana scowled at me as if I was looking at something dirty.

LABEL: 0x13E8
STRING: Do you really have to act like it's so disgusting?

LABEL: 0x1444
STRING: She's a normie through and through,

LABEL: 0x147B
STRING: who doesn't understand hobbies like mine and is hard on otakus like me.

LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1586
STRING: "Well, well, isn't it alright? As for me, I like One Piece too, you know."

LABEL: 0x1725
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1733
STRING: Hah? That's completely different. I'm not talking about that, I'm talking about those disgusting big-eyed, cutesy ones.

LABEL: 0x1855
STRING: And there it is! One Piece is okay, but moe stuff is not acceptable!

LABEL: 0x18CC
STRING: This woman is my complete opposite.

LABEL: 0x1915
STRING: Yukimaru's rather tolerant of moe, but Nana can't handle it at all.

LABEL: 0x1990
STRING: We're friends who met in middle school.

LABEL: 0x19E5
STRING: When we were in middle school, Nana, Yukimaru and I used to hang out together.

LABEL: 0x1A4A
STRING: I remember my parents used to get mad at me for playing until late at night every day...

LABEL: 0x1AAB
STRING: I'm not the mischievous kid I was back then, I'm now more of an indoor otaku type who's immersed in the world of 2-D.

LABEL: 0x1B45
STRING: ─While I was thinking about the past, the chime rang.

LABEL: 0x1BAA
STRING: Oops, is it that time already?

LABEL: 0x1BF1
STRING: Those two rabblerousers as well as their classmates took their seats at once.

LABEL: 0x1D4E
STRING: As homeroom begins, the classroom is silent.

LABEL: 0x1DAD
STRING: So it has begun...

LABEL: 0x1E79
STRING: When I looked up, I noticed an unfamiliar woman next to the teacher.

LABEL: 0x1EE1
STRING: Who's that?

LABEL: 0x1F00
STRING: She looks too mature to be a transfer student...

LABEL: 0x1F34
STRING: I mean, she's not even wearing a uniform.

LABEL: 0x1F8F
STRING: Instructor

LABEL: 0x1F9D
STRING: "Starting from today, we have a new temporary teaching assistant. She'll be observing everyone's classes, so be nice to her."

LABEL: 0x20DB
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x20E9
STRING: "My name is Scykoe%R(4,Saiko), and I'll be working in this class as a teacher-in-training starting from today."

LABEL: 0x228E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x229C
STRING: "Until my last day here, I'm hoping to get to know you all a lot."

LABEL: 0x2433
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x2441
STRING: "I know I'm not the best, but please take care of me."

LABEL: 0x2526
STRING: Wow, what a beautiful person...

LABEL: 0x2579
STRING: I could feel all the boys in the class gasping in awe of her beauty.

LABEL: 0x25DE
STRING: Just the idea of having such a beautiful woman in the same room starting from today is enough to get me hyped up.

LABEL: 0x265F
STRING: And so, starting today, the exciting class under the watchful eye of a beautiful woman began...

LABEL: 0x275F
STRING: ─Self-study time.

LABEL: 0x279C
STRING: My homeroom teacher is not in the classroom.

LABEL: 0x27E3
STRING: Right now, the teaching assistant's wandering around the classroom, watching over everyone's self-study.

LABEL: 0x285A
STRING: Normally, everyone does whatever they want because their homeroom teacher isn't there.

LABEL: 0x28C7
STRING: Well, it's understandable that everyone's nervous when a beautiful woman is watching them like this.

LABEL: 0x29D3
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x29E1
STRING: "Hey, you... What's your name? How do I pronounce it?"

LABEL: 0x2ACA
STRING: While the whole class was quietly studying, Scykoe-sensei spoke to me in a whisper.

LABEL: 0x2B35
STRING: Huh...?

LABEL: 0x2B63
STRING: W-why me?

LABEL: 0x2B86
STRING: Did I do something wrong?

LABEL: 0x2BB8
STRING: I didn't do anything to offend her... I hope.

LABEL: 0x2C5E
STRING: Flustered for a moment, I gave an honest answer.

LABEL: 0x2D5F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x2D6D
STRING: "Ara... Is that so, I knew it. Ufufufufu."

LABEL: 0x2E56
STRING: Scykoe-sensei smiled at me as if relieved by something.

LABEL: 0x2EBE
STRING: I don't know what the issue is.

LABEL: 0x2EF5
STRING: I can't read Sensei's mind at all.

LABEL: 0x2FDE
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x2FEC
STRING: "Listen, I need to talk to you, and I was wondering if you could come down to the staff room at lunchtime?"

LABEL: 0x3103
STRING: Could it be...

LABEL: 0x3140
STRING: A "private consultation" with the teacher?

LABEL: 0x3277
STRING: Lunch break.

LABEL: 0x3292
STRING: I was in standing front of the staff room door.

LABEL: 0x32D4
STRING: Ugh.

LABEL: 0x32EF
STRING: I'm nervous because I don't come to the staff room very often...

LABEL: 0x334C
STRING: When I fearfully opened the door, the teacher who received me was smiling and waving at me.

LABEL: 0x33B6
STRING: From her cheerfulness, it doesn't sound like bad news.

LABEL: 0x3401
STRING: ...So that's good at least.

LABEL: 0x34E9
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x34F7
STRING: "Mecchan... It's so good to see you again! Hehe, I'm so happy to meet you."

LABEL: 0x368C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x369A
STRING: "I've been wanting to see you for a long time, Mecchan. That's why I came back, do you remember me...?"

LABEL: 0x37AD
STRING: Apparently, the teacher and I had met before.

LABEL: 0x3804
STRING: But... where and when exactly?

LABEL: 0x3845
STRING: I have absolutely no recollection of this, when did I meet such a beautiful woman?

LABEL: 0x38B3
STRING: She knew my name, and calls me by my nickname "Mecchan".

LABEL: 0x3906
STRING: It sounds like we're more than just mere acquaintances.

LABEL: 0x3A3E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3A4C
STRING: "Well, don't rack your brains too hard about it... we even played together for a bit as kids back in the day, remember?"

LABEL: 0x3BFD
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3C0B
STRING: "Hmmm, what are you talking about, do you think there's anyone out there with that name? I'm afraid you're wrong on this one."

LABEL: 0x3DB6
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3DC4
STRING: "The correct answer is... Mecchan's future fiancee, Scykoe-oneechan!"

LABEL: 0x3F5B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3F69
STRING: "Of course you remember, don't you? ...Oh, you don't... remember...?"

LABEL: 0x4060
STRING: Fi-Fiancee!?

LABEL: 0x409E
STRING: What the hell is she talking about...!

LABEL: 0x40D7
STRING: There is no way I've become so intimate with a woman without knowing it?

LABEL: 0x4132
STRING: "Scykoe-oneechan"... With this name in mind, let's jog my memory once again.

LABEL: 0x4295
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x42A9
STRING: "Mecchan, I love you."

LABEL: 0x4308
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x431C
STRING: "When I grow up I'm going to be a teacher, so I'm going to go to Tokyo."

LABEL: 0x43EF
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x4403
STRING: "When I become a teacher, I'll teach you a lot, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x4486
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x449A
STRING: "It's goodbye for now, but... I'll be back for sure."

LABEL: 0x4511
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x4525
STRING: "So remember me, and don't forget me, okay? Promise me... It's a promise!"

LABEL: 0x4713
STRING: ...Ah! I remembered.

LABEL: 0x4756
STRING: Isn't Scykoe the girl whom I used to play with in the neighbourhood park when I was in elementary school?

LABEL: 0x47C9
STRING: I think it was a promise that when she became a teacher in the future, she would come back to teach me, who had bad grades.

LABEL: 0x48E4
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x48F2
STRING: "Hmm, you remembered, didn't you? I'm so glad... I'm back, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x49ED
STRING: My beloved "Scykoe-oneechan" has come back to our hometown.

LABEL: 0x4A48
STRING: You've come back as an adult, Scykoe...

LABEL: 0x4AA1

LABEL: 0x4B0E
STRING: She was cute back then, but now that she's an adult, she seems to have gotten more beautiful and ladylike.

LABEL: 0x4B94
STRING: Hmmm, so such a perfect person actually exists in real life.

LABEL: 0x4BEB
STRING: 2-D can't compete! Hooray for 3-D...!!

LABEL: 0x4CCE
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4CDC
STRING: "Hey, what are you staring at? By any chance... is it here?"

LABEL: 0x4DD5
STRING: Scykoe peevishly pointed at her cleavage.

LABEL: 0x4E40
STRING: Wow... Such big... tits!!!!

LABEL: 0x4E8F
STRING: I felt like I shouldn't be staring, so I looked away from her ample bosom. Scykoe giggled happily.

LABEL: 0x4FB8
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4FC6
STRING: "Hehe, was that too stimulating for a boy? Your face is turning red."

LABEL: 0x5177
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5185
STRING: "You haven't changed at all, Mecchan. You're still the cute, earnest and shy boy I remember. Onee-chan is so happy for you."

LABEL: 0x533C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x534A
STRING: "Oh... but you're a bit more naughty and lewd now, aren't you?"

LABEL: 0x5430
STRING: Ugh...

LABEL: 0x544F
STRING: You didn't have to say that, Scykoe...

LABEL: 0x5550
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x555E
STRING: "I heard from your homeroom teacher that... you are studying hard now? That you've got a good head on your shoulders."

STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5725
STRING: "That's amazing. ...But it's kind of a shame, because that means you can do it without me teaching you, right?"

LIST.STRING: Well, I'm not quite there yet...

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: "You don't have to be modest. I can tell when you're hiding something."

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: "But yes, if that's the case..."

STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5EC0

LABEL: 0x5F23
STRING: Aaaah... "non-academic" subjects... What could those be?

LABEL: 0x5FBC
STRING: No, I can't concentrate on my studies like this!

STRING: And I won't be able to sleep at night!

LABEL: 0x6027

LABEL: 0x6205

STRING: Nana, who had been silent on the sidelines thus far, spoke up.

LABEL: 0x6AC1
STRING: "Ah certainly, your face still looks a bit from when you were smaller, but it's hard to tell at a glance. If it were me, I probably wouldn't be able to recognize you after so long."

LABEL: 0x6BEC
STRING: ...Well these guys have a point,

LABEL: 0x6C27
STRING: but we recognized each other,

LABEL: 0x6C4D

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: Since I came all the way here

LABEL: 0x9475
STRING: I might as well try the tea.

STRING: In the midst of this silence, the sound of running water in the shower was plainly audible...

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: "Isn't it a pretty colour? It's made from a blue ore. Uh... What's it called again...?"

STRING: The fragrance of shampoo lingered on her damp hair...

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: "Did you know...? The top and bottom sides of a die always add up to seven."

LABEL: 0xA3F0
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA3FE
STRING: "You know, a long time ago in some faraway country, two prisoners on death row were making a bet for a chance to escape."

LABEL: 0xA599
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA5A7
STRING: "You roll the dice and whoever gets the biggest roll wins, the loser becomes the bait to let the winner escape."

LABEL: 0xA75E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA76C
STRING: "One was an ordinary single man, the other was a father with a wife and child waiting at home."

LABEL: 0xA909
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA917
STRING: "Which one do you think should win, Mecchan?"

I want the father to win.

STRING: Scykoe

STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xAFE9
STRING: "Shouldn't both lives have equal value...?"

LABEL: 0xB16C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB17A
STRING: "Actually, you know, there's no continuation to that story."

LABEL: 0xB2F9
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB307
STRING: "Maybe in the future it might be made."

LABEL: 0xB406
STRING: Grumble...

LABEL: 0xB445
STRING: My stomach rumbled loudly. Ugh, so embarrassing.

LABEL: 0xB53C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB54A
STRING: "Oh my goodness, just wait a minute. I'll prepare dinner right away."

LABEL: 0xB660
STRING: To think of it, I didn't have anything for lunch, did I?

LABEL: 0xB6BB
STRING: Sensei giggled as she put on her apron and headed for the kitchen.

LABEL: 0xB722
STRING: I wonder how long it's going to take? If she just started preparing now.

LABEL: 0xB783
STRING: I feel like I'm getting sleepy. I'm going to go lie down for a bit...

LABEL: 0xB8EF
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xB903
STRING: "Mecchan, I love you."

LABEL: 0xB962
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xB976
STRING: "When I grow up I'm going to be a teacher, so I'm going to go to Tokyo."

LABEL: 0xBA49
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xBA5D
STRING: "When I become a teacher, I'll teach you a lot, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0xBAE0
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xBAF4
STRING: "It's goodbye for now, but... I'll be back for sure."

LABEL: 0xBB6B
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xBB7F
STRING: "So remember me, and don't forget me, okay? Promise me... It's a promise!"

LABEL: 0xBD47
STRING: Apparently I'd dozed off for a bit.

LABEL: 0xBE4B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xBE59
STRING: "...Good morning, are you awake? Mecchan, you must be tired."

LABEL: 0xC006
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC014
STRING: "But don't worry, you won't have to feel that tired anymore."

LABEL: 0xC105
STRING: Sensei's gentle voice was tinged with a bit of eerieness.

LABEL: 0xC15E
STRING: Gradually, my vision became clearer and clearer.

LABEL: 0xC33B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC349
STRING: "Remember how I told you I'd teach you something that's not related to studying?"

LABEL: 0xC43A
STRING: When I saw what Sensei was holding in her hand, my face tensed up.

LABEL: 0xC499
STRING: The wire-like thing that stretched out from her hand was coiled around my neck.

LABEL: 0xC5A4
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC5B2
STRING: "There are so many things I want to teach you, Mecchan..."

LABEL: 0xC6AF
STRING: What... is this... Is she going to kill me?

LABEL: 0xC77A
STRING: The wire wrapped around my neck was gradually tightening.

LABEL: 0xC7DB
STRING: Ugh, guh....!!

LABEL: 0xC81E
STRING: Sensei smirked, as I felt my mouth open wide.

LABEL: 0xC920
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC92E
STRING: "I'll snatch it all away from you... Because I'm a bad woman!"

LABEL: 0xCA9B
STRING: The wire tightened around my neck with tremendous force.

LABEL: 0xCAEA
STRING: Barely conscious, I desperately struggled to stop Sensei.

LABEL: 0xCBEF
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xCBFD
STRING: "Sensei, everything that you loved... I'll snatch it all away from you. Heehee, hehehehe!! Ahahahahaha!!"

LABEL: 0xCD14
STRING: ...However my resistance was already futile.

LABEL: 0xCD75
STRING: Eventually, my strength left my arms and I faded into unconsciousness.

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Yearning」

LABEL: 0xD06A
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD078
STRING: "Wake up, Mecchan. Rise. And. Shine♪ You'll catch a cold if you sleep there."

LABEL: 0xD21D
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD22B
STRING: "Sorry to keep you waiting, but dinner is ready."

LABEL: 0xD311
STRING: It's done already!

LABEL: 0xD334
STRING: Whoa, it's true, it smells so good...

LABEL: 0xD387
STRING: I pulled myself up to look at the table, delicious looking dishes were spread out on top of it.

LABEL: 0xD3F1
STRING: Wow!

LABEL: 0xD40C
STRING: It looks good and the aroma is elegant and salivating.

LABEL: 0xD462
STRING: It's clear even to an amateur like me.

LABEL: 0xD48B
STRING: This must be absolutely delicious!

LABEL: 0xD4DC
STRING: Sensei you're awesome, you're even a great cook...!!

LABEL: 0xD528
STRING: She's a beautiful teacher, she's nice, and she's a good cook.

LABEL: 0xD55D
STRING: Full of talents... she's the best!

LABEL: 0xD640
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD64E
STRING: "Hey, try it before it gets cold! It's been a while since I've served anyone, so I'd love to hear what you think!"

LIST.STRING: Delish!! I'm moved by the flavour!

LABEL: 0xD85D
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD86B
STRING: "Thanks, I made it on short notice with whatever I had on hand... but I'm glad it's to your liking."

LABEL: 0xD974
STRING: Sensei was looking at me happily as I stuffed my face with food.

LABEL: 0xD9DF
STRING: Huh, Sensei doesn't have any dishes in front of her.

LABEL: 0xDA36
STRING: I'm the only one who's silently eating. ...Don't you want some too, Sensei?

LABEL: 0xDB3B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xDB49
STRING: "Ah, I'm not very hungry, so don't you worry about it."

LABEL: 0xDCE6
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xDCF4
STRING: "But more than that, I'm delighted just watching Mecchan eat with a satisfied look on his face."

LABEL: 0xDE99
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xDEA7
STRING: "Mecchan... I love you."

LABEL: 0xDF7E
STRING: Woah...

LABEL: 0xDFB7
STRING: My chopsticks fell out of my hand from the impact of that sudden confession.

LABEL: 0xE026
STRING: Yeah, I'm sure that was a hallucination, it's too shocking to be 3-D.

LABEL: 0xE08D
STRING: Well, it's not like she's a two-dimensional girl... only 2-D girls would say something like that.

LABEL: 0xE180
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE18E
STRING: "I love you, Mecchan. Did you hear me or are you just ignoring me?"

LABEL: 0xE27E
STRING: She said it again!

LABEL: 0xE29D
STRING: This person, she actually said it again!

LABEL: 0xE2C1
STRING: You didn't have to say it twice...

LABEL: 0xE31C
STRING: Argh Sensei... It's too much for my poor virgin heart.

LABEL: 0xE421
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE42F
STRING: "Heehee, you must be surprised, weren't you? You're so honest with your feelings it's weird."

LABEL: 0xE5C6
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE5D4
STRING: "I was more cool and reserved in the past, but now I can express my feelings to you directly like this... Surprising, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0xE7A7
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE7B5
STRING: "'I'm going to be a teacher!' do you remember that? At that time I was studying very hard and didn't have time for other things."

LABEL: 0xE966
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE974
STRING: "That's how much I've changed. That's how happy I am to see you again."

LABEL: 0xEB29
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xEB37
STRING: "Nostalgic, isn't it? I miss having dinner with you like this."

LABEL: 0xEC24
STRING: ...Hmm?

LABEL: 0xEC59
STRING: Huh, have I ever had dinner with you before?

LABEL: 0xECAE
STRING: I used to play with Scykoe-oneechan at the neighbourhood park...

LABEL: 0xED11
STRING: But I don't think our families were involved with each other.

LABEL: 0xED84
STRING: ...No, it might just be me.

LABEL: 0xEDC4
STRING: I'm sure I've just forgotten.

LABEL: 0xEDF9
STRING: They say that people will forget some memories as they get older.

LABEL: 0xEE58
STRING: As I was treated to a delicious meal, Sensei and I had a great time talking about the past.

LABEL: 0xEEC7
STRING: The time spent with the Sensei passes by in a blink of the eye.

LABEL: 0xEF1C
STRING: As it's getting late, it's finally time to call it a day.

LABEL: 0xF078
STRING: The sky was completely dark and it was no longer the time for children to go out.

LABEL: 0xF0E5
STRING: She couldn't let me walk by myself at night, so Sensei drove me to a place very close to my house.

LABEL: 0xF20B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xF219
STRING: "Well, be careful, and don't oversleep tomorrow, because I'd be sad if it was my fault."

LABEL: 0xF3CC
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xF3DA
STRING: "Heehee, I'm just kidding! See you again tomorrow, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0xF4DF
STRING: Sensei smiles mischievously, as if teasing me.

LABEL: 0xF5DC
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xF5EA
STRING: "Hey, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0xF75B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xF769
STRING: "Do you want... to come to my house tomorrow too?"

LABEL: 0xF850
STRING: "Of course I'll come," I replied.

LABEL: 0xF89B
STRING: I answered immediately.

LABEL: 0xF8D4
STRING: I had fun and I wanted to see her again. ...I felt sad when I had to go.

LABEL: 0xF94C
STRING: It wasn't just me.

LABEL: 0xF96F
STRING: She also looked a bit sad when we parted.

LABEL: 0xF9D8
STRING: It's only a brief separation, but we're already acting like a couple who can't bear to be apart even for a second.

LABEL: 0xFC74
STRING: Year 20XX, April XX

LABEL: 0xFCB5
STRING: XX City, XX Prefecture. The body of an unidentified woman was found.

LABEL: 0xFD14
STRING: According to the police, the body's age is unknown, its height is 165 cm. No belongings were found on the body, and it was completely naked.

LABEL: 0xFD9E
STRING: Although the corpse was identified as a woman from her physical appearance, her body was damaged beyond recognition.

LABEL: 0xFE0F
STRING: Her head had been cut off and taken away, and her breasts and lower abdomen had been gouged out of her torso.

LABEL: 0xFE8A
STRING: The police are currently investigating the identity of the body and the cause of death, suspecting it to be a homicide.

LABEL: 0x10194
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0x101D5
STRING: A woman illuminated by the twinkling stars was talking with a girl.

LABEL: 0x10258
STRING: "How unusual, I thought you weren't coming today."

LABEL: 0x102C3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10330
STRING: "Look, what a beautiful moon. Don't you think it's a perfect night for us to have a secret talk?"

LABEL: 0x103B9
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x103C7
STRING: "...I guess so."

LABEL: 0x1042A
STRING: "I can't tell what's on your mind if you don't say anything. Isn't there anything you want to talk about?"

LABEL: 0x104B3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x104C1
STRING: "...Why, how can you tell? Is my face that easy to read?"

LABEL: 0x1055A
STRING: "Yes, indeed. Don't make light of adults who've lived longer than you."

LABEL: 0x105E1
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x105EF
STRING: "Well, I suppose you're right."

LABEL: 0x1064C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1065A
STRING: "...There's someone I hate so much I want to kill them."

LABEL: 0x106D7
STRING: "You certainly picked a very dangerous topic."

LABEL: 0x10738
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10746
STRING: "I was just jealous at first. That person, I... respected them."

LABEL: 0x107B9
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x107C7
STRING: "They encouraged me when I was down, and supported me when I wanted to do something."

LABEL: 0x10858
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10866
STRING: "But strangely enough, I wasn't happy about it, and inwardly I began to suspect that they were making fun of me..."

LABEL: 0x10921
STRING: "And then?"

LABEL: 0x1096E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1097C
STRING: "I don't even want to look at their face anymore."

LABEL: 0x109E3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x109F1
STRING: "As I went further and further down in despair, that person continued to climb up in life."

LABEL: 0x10A80
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10A8E
STRING: "The more achievements they got, the more miserable I became."

LABEL: 0x10B21
STRING: "And so you wanted to kill them?"

LABEL: 0x10B7C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10B8A
STRING: "Yes."

LABEL: 0x10BD5
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10BE3
STRING: "It's not fair. Even though we started from the same place... Only they got anything, I couldn't get any results at all."

LABEL: 0x10C8C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10C9A
STRING: "I wanted... to be happy too. I wanted to be born and raised in a favourable environment and loving family like them."

LABEL: 0x10D49
STRING: "It's not that simple. Wishing for someone else's misfortune doesn't make you happy, you know?"

LABEL: 0x10DCE
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10DDC
STRING: "...I know that."

LABEL: 0x10E45
STRING: "You don't. Don't you understand how foolish it is to try to drag others down by wishing misery on them?"

LABEL: 0x10EF0
STRING: "Did you really think that person wasn't trying hard as well?"

LABEL: 0x10F6D
STRING: "There're no shortcuts to glory, and sometimes it just doesn't work out."

LABEL: 0x11006
STRING: "Anyone who's successful has gotten there by putting in no small amount of effort."

LABEL: 0x1108D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1109B
STRING: "But I'm trying my best too!"

LABEL: 0x11108
STRING: "I'm sorry... but there's no guarantee in life that your efforts will be rewarded."

LABEL: 0x1119B
STRING: "In order to not put that effort to waste, you must change your approach."

LABEL: 0x11234
STRING: "Do not frown upon your fate and stop turning away from it."

LABEL: 0x112B7
STRING: "If you do, the one who will be empty-handed... is you."

LABEL: 0x1132A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x11338
STRING: "But... But... That's... No one was there to teach me!"

LABEL: 0x113B3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x113C1
STRING: "That person only lended their full support to me, but no advice!"

LABEL: 0x1144E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1145C
STRING: "They told me everything I was doing was right, so... so!"

LABEL: 0x114E7
STRING: "By the time you realized, you'd already come to a point where there was no turning back... right?"

LABEL: 0x11580
STRING: "You're so obsessed with them. Do you like that person?"

LABEL: 0x115FD
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1160B
STRING: "No, I don't, I hate them. I really hate them."

LABEL: 0x11684
STRING: "...If that's the case, then those feelings of yours must be a lie, too, right?"

LABEL: 0x11703
STRING: "Your feelings of jealousy toward that person too. Your wishes to be happy too."

LABEL: 0x11794
STRING: "What you really wish for is a brutal demise that will be engraved into memory."
